headlines.description: — Kendell Brooks scored on a 53-yard interception return and rookie quarterback Cameron Ward had mixed results as the Tennessee Titans beat the Atlanta Falcons 23-20 in a preseason game Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brooks scores on interception return as Ward has mixed results in Titans' 23-20 win over Falcons

events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Seattle Seahawks

headlines.description: — Sam Darnold looked the part of a franchise quarterback in his first appearance at Lumen Field as the Seattle Seahawks beat the Kansas City Chiefs 33-16 in a preseason game on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sam Darnold impresses in preseason debut with Seattle Seahawks, win against Kansas City Chiefs

headlines.description: — Backup quarterback Zach Wilson had a strong first half for the Dolphins and third-stringer Quinn Ewers threw for two second-half touchdowns as Miami beat the Detroit Lions 24-17 in the preseason on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zach Wilson and Quinn Ewers lead Dolphins to 24-17 preseason win over Lions

events.name: Green Bay Packers at Indianapolis Colts

headlines.description: — Indianapolis Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson again showed glimpses of his potential Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Richardson starts fast, Packers finish strong to rally past Colts 23-19 in preseason

events.name: New England Patriots at Minnesota Vikings

headlines.description: — New England rookies TreVeyon Henderson and Efton Chism III each had another preseason touchdown, and the Patriots beat the Minnesota Vikings 20-12 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Patriots beat Vikings 20-12 as rookies Henderson and Chism each record another preseason TD

headlines.description: — The Cleveland Browns had to turn to other quarterbacks with rookie Shedeur Sanders injured.
headlines.shortLinkText: K.J. Henry's pick-6 leads Browns to win over Eagles in preseason game with Shedeur Sanders sidelined

headlines.description: — C.J. Stroud found Nico Collins for a touchdown pass on his second drive Saturday in Houston's preseason win over the Carolina Panthers.
headlines.shortLinkText: C.J. Stroud's TD pass helps Texans defeat Panthers 20-3 in preseason

events.name: San Francisco 49ers at Las Vegas Raiders

headlines.description: — Raiders rookie Ashton Jeanty proved he could deliver hits and absorb them at the NFL level, rushing for a bruising 33 yards and a touchdown on seven carries in Las Vegas' 22-19 preseason loss to the San Francisco 49ers on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raiders rookie Ashton Jeanty takes a hit, then delivers one in 22-19 loss to the 49ers

headlines.description: — Cooper Rush threw a touchdown pass and a pick-6 in his return to AT&T Stadium, and rookie Tyler Loop kicked five field goals as the Baltimore Ravens beat the Dallas Cowboys 31-13 in a preseason game on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Happy homecomings for QB Cooper Rush, rookie K Tyler Loop in Ravens' 31-13 win over Cowboys

events.name: Los Angeles Chargers at Los Angeles Rams

headlines.description: — Another quarterback might have been a bit shaken after throwing a fourth-quarter interception to a 305-pound defensive tackle — and then getting run over by the big man while he rumbled downfield with the ball.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stetson Bennett rallies Rams to 23-22 preseason win over Chargers, overcoming D-line interception

events.name: New York Jets at New York Giants

headlines.description: — Getting snaps with the first-team offense, then throwing for a touchdown and running for another with the backups, Jaxson Dart shined in his new home stadium debut for the New York Giants as part of a 31-12 victory against the Jets on Saturday night...
headlines.shortLinkText: Rookie QB Jaxson Dart stars in his home preseason debut as the Giants beat the Jets 31-12

events.name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Pittsburgh Steelers

headlines.description: — For a high school football coach, Teddy Bridgewater can still sling it.
headlines.shortLinkText: Teddy Bridgewater throws 2 TDs as the Buccaneers slip by the Steelers 17-14 in preseason

headlines.description: — Troy Franklin caught two touchdown passes from Jarrett Stidham and the Denver Broncos rolled over the Arizona Cardinals 27-7 on Saturday night in a matchup of mostly backups.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jarrett Stidham hits Troy Franklin for pair of touchdowns as Broncos roll over Cardinals 27-7

events.name: Jacksonville Jaguars at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: — Spencer Rattler now has some late-game highlights on his preseason resume as he competes with rookie Tyler Shough to become the New Orleans Saints' starting quarterback.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rattler rallies Saints to 17-all preseason tie with Jaguars as competition with Shough continues

headlines.description: — Caleb Williams' rocky training camp now seems to be on the upswing.
headlines.shortLinkText: Caleb Williams looks sharp in Ben Johnson's offense as Bears rout Bills 38-0 in preseason
